import React from 'react'; import Modal from './Modal'; import { HandRaisedIcon, PlayIcon, PuzzlePieceIcon, CursorArrowRaysIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid'; const InstructionsModal = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { return (

Drawing Walls

Click and drag on empty cells to create walls/obstacles

Moving Start/Target

Click and drag the green start node or amber target node to reposition them

Running Algorithms

Select an algorithm and click 'Run Algorithm' to visualize pathfinding with animated bubbles

Generating Mazes

Choose 'Prim's Algorithm' from maze generation dropdown and click 'Generate Maze' to watch animated maze construction

 ); }; export default InstructionsModal;
